Hey! I'm Sam Casey, a full-stack software developer.

This site is where I display my best projects, designs, and blogs. If you want to view my projects, read my blogs, check out my resume, or get in touch, you're in the right place!

In my free time, you can find me outdoors 🌲, spending time with friends 🤙, reading 📚, or watching the Boston Celtics 🏀 🍀
